Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.attachment

Interface Summary
IAeAttachmentStorage Attachment storage interface.
 

Class Summary
AeAttachmentFile Implements a file managed by an AeFileAttachmentStorage.
AeAttachmentFileInputStream Extends AeBlobInputStream to automatically add a reference to an AeAttachmentFile.
AeFileAttachmentStorage Implements an attachment storage that stores the contents of attachments in temporary files.
AeFileAttachmentStorage.AeAttachmentInfo Defines a simple struct of attachment information.
AeFileAttachmentStorage.AeLongCounter Implements a simple counter.
AeStoredAttachmentItem Represents an attachment item that has been stored by the attachment manager.
AeStreamAttachmentItem Implements an attachment item that has not yet been stored by the attachment manager.
